page.shortlink: api registry object drop settings function

argument.name: name
argument.description: The name of a registry entry.

page.discussion: The REGISTRY.DROP_SETTINGS() method deletes the Registry_Key from the REGISTRY. The Registry_Key is relative to the root key. The root key is for Alpha Anywhere:

section.title: Example
section.description: Delete the variables under the registry key of UserInformation.
section.note: You must first drop all sub-keys or else the command will not work.
